name: The White Bird (Outer Space Company)
description:
The white bird is going on to a journey to save her chick which is jailed in the last chamber of the black castle. And in the castle - many weird things are waiting for her ...

Collect all diamonds to unlock keys and proceed to the last chamber of the black castle to save the chick

Move forward: D key

Switch direction: J key

Use mouse in menus (left button)
